meanings.definition: Lasting for more than one day.
meanings.sent1: The multiday camping trip was so much fun!
meanings.sent2: The multiday event attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The multiday rainstorm made the backyard a muddy mess.
meanings.sent4: Her multiday headache felt like a never-ending drumbeat.
meanings.sent5: The multiday festival left everyone exhausted but happy.

meanings.definition: Involving or lasting for multiple days.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed the multiday vacation by the beach.
meanings.sent2: The multiday conference covered a wide range of topics.
meanings.sent3: The multiday power outage led to creative candlelit dinners.
meanings.sent4: His multiday absence left a noticeable gap in the team.
meanings.sent5: The multiday road trip was filled with laughter and adventure.
